description.p: Start logging any task's time to completion, with the ability to stop the timer at any moment, with notifications for longer task sessions.
Начните регистрировать время выполнения любой задачи, с возможностью остановить таймер в любой момент, с уведомлениями о более длительном выполнении задачи.
Inizia a registrare il tempo di completamento di qualsiasi attività, con la possibilità di interrompere il timer in qualsiasi momento, con notifiche per sessioni di attività più lunghe.
Počni bilježiti vrijeme bilo kojeg zadatka do završetka, s mogućnošću prekidanja štoperice u bilo kojem trenutku, s obavijestima za duže sesije zadataka.
Comience a registrar el tiempo de cualquier tarea hasta su finalización, con la posibilidad de detener el temporizador en cualquier momento, con notificaciones para las sesiones de tareas más largas.

Changed: UI now follows my own style that complements that of Adwaita, called Solo.
Changed: The UI colors, they are now way less in your face yet are still colored. The Logs are now stylized like cards.
Removed: each log's delete button, as they would be accidentally clicked and would remove the log.
Added: Logs now have tags! Add tags in the new entry below log name, by specifying them with colons, like this: "tag1:tag2:tag3".
Changed: UI now sports an experimental design.
Changed: A robust backend rewrite.
Changed: The UI is now with a better layout.
